OCD.name: Apache Sling Scripting Thymeleaf “ResourceBundle MessageResolver”
OCD.description: Resolves messages by using Sling's resource bundle provider from Sling i18n.

AD.name: order
AD.description: Property for ordering message resolvers inside the Thymeleaf template engine.

AD.name: absent message representation type
AD.description: If no AbsentMessageRepresentationProvider is present, empty (''), blank (' ') or the message key can represent an absent message.
